title: Integrated Problem-Based and Networked Learning Course for Digital Engineering Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in fundamental engineering design principles, practical experience, and digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: A course for working professionals participating concurrently with job responsibilities, offering flexible learning environments via personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can complete PBL projects that solve engineering design problems using digital collaboration tools
Learners can operate online discussion and feedback systems for knowledge sharing with peers and experts in networked learning environments
Learners can simulate creative problem-solving processes in hybrid (online/offline) design studio environments
Learners can document each stage of the engineering design process and create a digital portfolio

resources: Online Project Management Tool (e.g., Notion, Trello)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
